cats_lover.description: Cat shaped night light.nSay hello to this Kawaii Kitten Night Light, an adorable night cat lamp that stays by your side and brings brightness, warmth, and happiness to you. shop_for_cats.name: BLUE ZIGZAG CAT TIPI TENT
shop_for_cats.description: Blue zigzag cat tipi, cool in the summer and warm in the winter, tipis make the perfect all-season cat home. Everyone needs a little space just for themselves, including our furry friends. These teepees provide the perfect scape for your kitty and are a charming addition to any room.

shop_for_cats.name: CAT CERAMIC BOWLS WITH BAMBOO TABLEWARE
shop_for_cats.description: Cat ceramic bowls with bamboo tableware.This cat food stand bowl is made from bamboo which has high water resistance properties. The cat ceramic bowls with bamboo tableware prevents your cat from sliding bowls around and provides protection for your floors. It is also very easy to clean, using these elevated cat feeders keeps the feeding area cleaner which is essential to a sanitary life, just simply wipe the surface of the feeder table clean.These elevated dishes provide easy access to food and water which can help facilitate the movement of food when traveling from the mouth to the stomach and it places less strain on the cat’s neck, hips, shoulders, and joints, which promotes better posture. The ceramic bowls are durable, sanitary, rust-free, non-leaching and dishwasher safe.

shop_for_cats.name: CAT INTERACTIVE WOOD PUZZLE
shop_for_cats.description: Cat interactive wood puzzle.Made of high-quality solid wood, durable, eco-friendly and bite-resistant, this addictive cat toy is designed with 5 holes at the top. The cartoon animals captivate your cat’s attention, this interactive toy is a great way to help your cat get the much needed daily exercise and excitement, it keeps your cat away from boredom and excites his natural instincts and curiosity. The cat interactive wood puzzle increases the bond between the cat and its owner. It is a great way for you to play with your lovely cat!

shop_for_cats.name: CAT SCRATCHER HOUSE TOY
shop_for_cats.description: Cat scratcher house toy for your cats, a triangle-shaped house with stable and foldable design.Environment safe materials and easy to assemble with step by step instruction included, this cat scratcher house toy is a cute tent for cats to hide and feel safe in! It has a scratching board on the side that will save the rest of your furniture. It is easy storage, it folds flat and needs no assembly. The house toy is great for sleeping and also gives extra dimension for fun playtime too!

shop_for_cats.name: CAT SCRATCHING POST NON TOXIC SISAL HEMP
shop_for_cats.description: Cat scratching post, non-toxic sisal hemp, protects furniture from your kitty’s grinding claws.Great cat’s toy, beautifully designed for cats to scratch, easy to assemble with step by step instructions.

shop_for_cats.name: CAT TEASER WAND WITH BELL AND FEATHERS
shop_for_cats.description: Cat teaser wooden wand with bell and bird feathers. Very interactive toy to strengthen the relationships between you and your cat.Kitty will flip, jump, pounce, chase and prowl with this wooden cat toy.

shop_for_cats.name: COLORFUL FEATHER WAND WITH BELL
shop_for_cats.description: Colorful feather wand with bell, chaser toy.Cats love feathers! Your kitty will have the time of his life with these colorful wands.

shop_for_cats.name: DIY WASHABLE CAT NEST
shop_for_cats.description: DIY washable cat nest. It provides the ultimate comfort and luxury for your pet.Your cat will love this bed with a pillow! Bright holiday colors and unique design, cute and sweet.

shop_for_cats.name: GREEN PRINTED TUNNEL WITH BALL
shop_for_cats.description: Green printed tunnel toy with fun ball for your kitty.Lovely green design, your cat won’t be able to resist.Printed-design, get your cat’s attention.Easy to fold, save your space.Easy to clean.This green printed tunnel toy is a great kind of exercise for your cat.
